wuparam - WU Whipple Data Analysis Package

wuparam calculates the Hillas Parameters for events stored in Whipple telescope raw data files. - To compile and run wuparam, you must install the following packages:

  1. The GNU Scientific Library (GSL) (http://rpmfind.net/linux/rpm2html/search.php?query=gsl-devel)
  2. GNU plotutils package (http://rpmfind.net/linux/rpm2html/search.php?query=plotutils)
